data.prayer: Father, please raise up every one you have called in Sogn og Fjordane, Norway to become worthy of their calling, and offer spiritual sacrifices acceptable to you through Jesus.
data.verse: I urge you to live a life worthy of the calling you have received

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Sogn og Fjordane, Norway
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Spirit, teach the 8,741 believers that their old life is dead and their new life is hid with Christ.
data.verse: For you died, and your life is hidden with Christ in God.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 12 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Father, you have chosen the weak things of this world to confound the strong. Make the poor and outcast in the state of Sogn og Fjordane a testimony of your strength.
data.verse: God chose the foolish things of the world that he might put to shame those who are wise. God chose the weak things of the world, that he might put to shame the things that are strong;

data.prayer: Father, for all those you call to look after your flock from the 8,741 believers in Sogn og Fjordane, please, make them passionate about hearing your Word.
data.verse: Therefore, you shepherds, hear the word of the LORD.

data.prayer: Lord God, I thank you that the blood of Christ, who through the eternal Spirit offered himself without defect to God, can cleanse the Persian people conscience from dead works to serve the living God.
Lord, stir the hearts of your people in the state of Sogn og Fjordane to agree with you in prayer.
data.verse: I [Jesus] pray also for those who will believe in me through their message, that all of them may be one, Father, just as you are in me and I am in you. May they also be in us so that the world may believe that you have sent me.

data.prayer: Father, help media producers communicate the gospel in a way that is understandable to the people of Sogn og Fjordane, Norway.
data.verse: But from there, you will seek the LORD your God, and you will find Him if you search for Him with all your heart and all your soul.

data.prayer: Father, please send new evangelists into the harvest in the state of Sogn og Fjordane, Norway.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

location.name: Sogn og Fjordane
location.people_groups_list: Czech, Arab, Lebanese, Turk, Somali, Jew, Norwegian-speaking
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Czech (2,200), Arab, Lebanese (2,300), Turk (20,000), Somali (39,000), Jew, Norwegian-speaking (1,300)
